uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail

Class ShortContentMessageVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.AbstractContexed
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail.AbstractVisitor
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail.ContentMessageVisitor
          • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail.ShortContentMessageVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Contexed, Visitor

    public class ShortContentMessageVisitor
extends ContentMessageVisitor
    A ContentMessageVisitor that only shows each message once. If a message has already been displayed but occurs a second time (e.g. as part of a reply) then it is shown as a link rather than in-line. Messages with the same MEssage-ID are assumed to be the same message.
